title: Wow Riot you Trolls, Placement System is a JOKE...

embed.description: The most viral images on the internet, curated in real time by a dedicated community through commenting, voting and sharing.

body:
So I just completed My placement matches and won 9 out of 10 games here's my scores below:

Game 1: 20/7/13 - WIN
Game 2: 5/10/5 - LOSS
Game 3: 5/1/31 - WIN
Game 4: 13/4/10 - WIN
Game 5: 15/3/4 - WIN
Game 6: 17/5/6 - WIN
Game 7: 11/5/5 - WIN
Game 8: 26/8/3 - WIN
Game 9: 8/2/7 - WIN
Game 10: 6/2/4 - WIN

Congratulations Summoner Your In Bronze 3, Good Luck Getting out trololololl.

replies.body:
Well then, if you can win that percentage of matches you should be fine for getting out of bronze anyway.

The amount you win is not the only deciding factor though. For instance, if you win all ten games that doesn't mean you should be in gold.

Last season I won 3 out of 10 and got put in Silver 4, lol.
The people you were playing with were bronzens also which is why you were able to win 9/10 games and got placed in bronzen elo.

What rank were you last season

if you were bronze, then that explains it.
Yeah I was Bronze 3, Not that I think I Really deserved to be there in the end, although I thought this Was a NEW SEASON, A fresh start. hence the PLACEMENT MATCHES.

> [{quoted}](name=Effect,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5MXUHH8c,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-21T05:30:41.404+0000)
>
> Yeah I was Bronze 3, Not that I think I Really deserved to be there in the end, although I thought this Was a NEW SEASON, A fresh start. hence the PLACEMENT MATCHES.

you don't understand how a soft reset works then.

The 'soft reset' means your MMR is slightly lower than where you ended up last season. If you ended bronze 3, your new MMR would be bronze4/5. 
You winning the games proves that you deserved to be in bronze 3 and you will have decent MMR and therefore LP gains making it easier to climb to where you deserve to be.
Don't you need to do all 10 placement games after the reset?
does your pre season rank/mmr matter?
is this preseason or prior to preseason ranking?

u were bronze last season obviously

thats why bronze 3 lel

What rank where u before? You elo must have been %%%% house lol by the way riot stated that the placements this year don't have such a heavy waiting on your actual reenlistment into the ladder. So all the trolls last year who deliberately sank there MMR don't get a free ticket and clean slate again this season. I.e u made your bed

Would you mind doing this for me?
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/NW2dE2AR-season-2015

Placements take into account what rank you were last season (it has a large impact on where you place)
